title: Sousa (José Caminha de Vasconcelos e)
body: He was the Count and Marquis of Castelo Melhor, and the last grantee of the captaincy of Funchal, having ceded to the crown, by deed of September 9, 1766, most of his rights and prerogatives.

Funchal: Location of the captaincy ceded to the crown

1766: Cession to the crown of most of the rights and prerogatives of the captaincy of Funchal
